    • getMedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord getMedicalRecord(String patientId)
      Retrieves the medical record for a patient based on their ID.
      Specified by:
      getMedicalRecord in interface MedicalRecordService
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose medical record is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      The patient's medical record.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no medical record exists for the specified patient.

    • updateContactInfo

      public void updateContactInfo(String patientId, String phone, String email)
      Updates the contact information (phone and email) for a patient's medical record.
      Specified by:
      updateContactInfo in interface MedicalRecordService
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose contact information is being updated.
      phone - The new phone number.
      email - The new email address.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the phone or email is null or empty.

    • addDiagnosis

      public void addDiagnosis(String patientId, String diagnosis, String treatment)
      Adds a diagnosis and corresponding treatment to a patient's medical record.
      Specified by:
      addDiagnosis in interface MedicalRecordService
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient for whom the diagnosis is being added.
      diagnosis - A description of the diagnosis.
      treatment - A description of the treatment provided.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the diagnosis or treatment is null or empty.

    • addMedicalRecord

      public void addMedicalRecord(String patientId, MedicalRecord record)
      Adds a new medical record to the system for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient for whom the medical record is being added.
      record - The medical record to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a medical record already exists for the specified patient.

    • getAllMedicalRecords

      public List<MedicalRecord> getAllMedicalRecords()
      Retrieves all medical records in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all medical records.

    • hasMedicalRecord

      public boolean hasMedicalRecord(String patientId)
      Checks if a medical record exists for a patient based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to check.
      Returns:
      true if the medical record exists, false otherwise.

    • getMedicalRecordsByBloodType

      public List<MedicalRecord> getMedicalRecordsByBloodType(BloodType bloodType)
      Retrieves a list of medical records that match a specified blood type.
      Parameters:
      bloodType - The blood type to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of medical records matching the specified blood type.

    • searchMedicalRecordsByDiagnosis

      public List<MedicalRecord> searchMedicalRecordsByDiagnosis(String diagnosisKeyword)
      Searches medical records for a specific diagnosis keyword.
      Parameters:
      diagnosisKeyword - The keyword to search for in diagnosis descriptions.
      Returns:
      A list of medical records containing the diagnosis keyword.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the search keyword is null or empty.

    • removeMedicalRecord

      public boolean removeMedicalRecord(String patientId)
      Removes a medical record from the system for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose medical record is to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the medical record was successfully removed, false if the record didn't exist.
